item.title: Notes from reading 'Rich Dad Poor Dad'
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: The rich buy assets. The poor only have expenses. The middle class buy liabilities they think are assets.

item.title: Notes from reading 'How an Economy Grows and Why It Crashes'
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: How an Economy Grows and Why it Crashes uses illustration, humor, and accessible storytelling to explain complex topics of economic growth and monetary systems.

item.title: Notes from reading 'Nonviolent Communication: A Language of Life'
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: Four steps of Nonviolent Communication: observe, identify and state feelings, identify and state needs, and make requests.

item.title: Notes from reading 'Influence: The Psychology of Persuasion'
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: The 6 principles of persuasion are Reciprocation, Commitment and Consistency, Social Proof, Liking, Authority, Scarcity.

item.title: Notes from reading 'Educated: A Memoir'
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: Flee as a bird to your mountain.

item.title: Notes from reading 'Secrets of the World's Happiest People'
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: The six ingredients of happiness are togetherness, money, health, freedom, trust and kindness.

item.title: Notes from reading 'Pomodoro Technique Illustrated'
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: The Pomodoro Technique is designed to maintain focus and prevent burnout.

item.title: Notes from reading 'PEAK: Secrets from the New Science of Expertise'
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: The core elements of deliberate practice include focus, feedback and fix, stepping out of the comfort zone, extensive training, and mentorship.

item.title: Notes from reading 'The Willpower Instinct'
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: The lack of self-control is not only a psychological problem, but also influenced by physiology, psychological traps and various social factors.

item.title: Notes from reading 'Live for Death: My Experience on Dying'
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: Walked through the valley of the shadow of death and tasted the nectar of life.
